dimension:
8 x 6 3/8 in. (20.3 x 16.2 cm) [image and image on verso]
11 3/8 x 9 7/8 x 1 in. (28.9 x 25.1 x 2.5 cm) [framed]
title: The Artist?s Mother Opening a Door
description: two sided painting; verso, earlier street scene painted by Vuillard. Entitled \'Maisons, La Nuit\', about 1897
creditline: The Margaret G. Deal Fund in honor of Gertrude C. Deal, Harrison H. Deal and Mary Deal Selcer
